original_text: God is the one who has prepared us to have a new life in heaven one day. He has given his Spirit to be with us now. Because of that, we know that we will receive all God's good things one day.
korean_text: 곧 이것을 우리에게 이루게 하시고 보증으로 성령을 우리에게 주신 이는 하나님이시니라

sentences.original_text: God is the one who has prepared us
to have a new life in heaven one day
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가 하늘에서 새로운 삶을 누리기 위해

sentences.original_text: He has given his Spirit to be with us now
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 지금 우리와 함께 하시도록 성령을 주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: we know that we will receive
all God's good things one day
